title: Companion Approval Guide
content:
dhammer to Umberlee: Minthara + Astarion + Defend Redhammer: Minthara - Astarion - Give Redhammer to Umberlee: Wyll - Redhammer Lower City - Iron Throne prison

In the Guildhall, tell Nine-Fingers Keene that Jaheria is not alone

Must have Jaheira in your party

In the Guildhall, tell Nine-Fingers Keene that you're a friend of Jaheira's.

Must have Jaheira in your party

Give Rags Deelarma some money

Must have Jaheira in your party

Talk to Jaheira About Minsc

After the events of the counting
